parameters.name: AuthPassword
parameters.description: The password of the CHAP protocol.

parameters.name: AuthProtocol
parameters.description: The authentication protocol. Set the value to **CHAP**.

parameters.name: AuthUser
parameters.description: The username of the CHAP protocol.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the volume. The description must be 2 to 128 characters in length. The description cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: IsAuth
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable authentication. Valid values:

*   **1**: Authentication is enabled.
*   **0** (default): Authentication is disabled.

parameters.name: IsEnable
parameters.description:
Indicates whether the volume is enabled. Valid values:

*   **1** (default): The volume is enabled.
*   **0**: The volume is disabled.

parameters.name: StorageId
parameters.description: The ID of the storage medium.

parameters.name: VolumeName
parameters.description: The name of the volume. The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length. The name cannot start with `http://` or `https://`. The name can contain letters, digits, colons (:), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).
